trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 화면의 컬렉션을 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: This class provides a read-only collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 디자인 화면의 읽기 전용 컬렉션을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection members to the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> array beginning at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 컬렉션 멤버 복사 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> 지정된 된 대상 인덱스에서 시작 하는 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy collection members to.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 멤버를 복사할 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The destination index to begin copying to.
trans-unit.target: 복사를 시작할 대상 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of design surfaces in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 화면 디자인의 총 수를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The total number of elements in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 요소의 총 수는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 반복할 수 있는 열거자를 반환 된 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>에 대 한는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref> 인스턴스.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the design surface at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스에서 디자인 화면을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the design surface to return.
trans-unit.target: 반환할 디자인 화면의의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The design surface at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스에서 디자인 화면입니다.

trans-unit.source: The design surface specified by index is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 화면으로 지정 된 index 지원 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>메서드.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 1 차원 <xref:System.Array>에서 복사 된 값의 대상인 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index in `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스 `array` 복사를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count*> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count*>속성.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 요소의 수는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>속성.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우에 대 한 액세스는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref> 은 동기화 (스레드로부터 안전함); 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>속성.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator*>메서드.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator*>

trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>
